title: Constructivist-Based English Writing Proficiency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Grammar and Writing Structure Comprehension
context.additional_context: Emphasis on Practical Writing Skills Applicable to the Work Environment of Current Practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can utilize structures and expressive strategies tailored to various writing purposes (e.g., business reports, proposals, analytical documents).
Learners can iteratively refine drafts through peer feedback and self-assessment processes.
Learners can complete team-based writing projects using digital tools (e.g., collaboration platforms, grammar checkers).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
